definition: to follow/to comply with/varying according to.../to allow/subsequently
namely/that is/i.e./prompt/at once/at present/even if/prompted (by the occasion)/to approach/to come into contact/to assume (office)/to draw near

sentences.english: The wounded soldier opened his eyes once, but lost consciousness again immediately.
sentences.chinese: 那个伤员睁了一下眼晴随即又昏了过去。

sentences.english: A puff of blue smoke came out and then a big jinnee.
sentences.chinese: 一股蓝烟冒出来，随即又冒出来一个巨大的魔仆。

sentences.english: Lorz was immediately banned for life from any future amateur competition.
sentences.chinese: 洛尔斯随即被宣判终身不得参加任何业余比赛。

sentences.english: Within a short while the 13th Army Group was completely wiped out, with all its troops surrendered.
sentences.chinese: 第十三兵团随即全军覆没，所属部队全部投降。

sentences.english: But then have a large number of the soldiers of qing appear, iron young tiger immediately call all fled.
sentences.chinese: 但随即已有大批清兵出现，铁彪立刻叫众人躲避。

sentences.english: In fact, I'm reading a number of books right now on software teams and ways that seem to help form good teams.
sentences.chinese: 随即我开始阅读大量关于软件团队和工作方式的书籍。

sentences.english: Immediately, Sumou was sent to Nanning Red Cross Hospital for treatment.
sentences.chinese: 随即，苏某被送到南宁市红十字会医院进行救治。

sentences.english: 27So he immediately sent an executioner with orders to bring John's head. The man went, beheaded John in the prison
sentences.chinese: 随即差一个护卫兵，吩咐拿约翰的头来。

sentences.english: Mr. Munson spat on one of the windows.
sentences.chinese: 老李随即啐了一口吐沫在酒吧的一扇窗户上。

sentences.english: Qionghua joins the Red Detachment, and is presented a rifle by her Company Officer.
sentences.chinese: 琼花随即加入娘子军，并由连长授枪。

sentences.english: But one of the soldiers with a spear pierced his side, and forthwith came there out blood and water.
sentences.chinese: 惟有一个兵拿枪扎他的肋旁，随即有血和水流出来。

sentences.english: It is urgent that just immedihpost measures should guarinitiing ould likeeedficevery one of they get to stop thesituine.
sentences.chinese: 很紧迫的是应随即采取措施阻止这一事态的发达。

sentences.english: Qian was immediately allowed to establish an Institute of Mechanics in Beijing, and to work within the state -established Chinese Academy of Science.
sentences.chinese: 钱回国后随即在北京建立力学院，并创建中国科学院。

definition: to catch and hold on/to continue/to go on to do sth/to follow/to carry on/then/after that/subsequently/to proceed/to ensue/in turn/in one's turn
(of a person) to turn round/to face about/(of a widow) to remarry (archaic)
at once/right away/immediately/on horseback (i.e. by military force)
